title: RA Sushi offers Sweet Mochi Trio dessert
statement: RA Sushi serves a Sweet Mochi Trio dessert with three flavor options: chocolate, strawberry and mango, served with raspberry and chocolate sauces.

citations.quote: A traditional Japanese ice cream dessert wrapped in sweet rice cake; your choice of any three flavors: chocolate, strawberry and mango; served with raspberry and chocolate sauces
